post.text: "The fear of nuclear war that we had as children, I never thought our children would ever have to deal with that again."

comment.author: Mariah
comment.text: Why do Rump supporters Troll these sites? Never fails. They just Have to spread their mean spirited ignorance everywhere they can. I don't go on Trump sites and Troll their hateful agenda. I guess if you spend your day watching Fox and looking up right wing conspiracy plots, you have plenty of time on your hands.

replies.author: Abigail
replies.text: This isn't a private page. It's a public page. You are most welcomed to comment on Trumps page as well. It's freedom of speech.

replies.author: Mariah
replies.text: Obviously. but why bother? It's quite clearly a Clinton supporter page. But you just Have to spout the same old Rump agenda everywhere on the Internet. Yeah, you are free to do that if it makes you feel powerful?

replies.author: Emma
replies.text: Mariah J. <<< The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing. Edmund Burke
